subject: Colleges and Universities
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Discrimination
Volleyball
College Athletics
Christians and Christianity
lead_paragraph: Erskine College in South Carolina recently issued a statement condemning same-sex relationships, about a year after two of its male volleyball players came out as gay.
snippet: Erskine College in South Carolina recently issued a statement condemning same-sex relationships, about a year after two of its male volleyball players came out as gay.
